projectDesc.p: Hugoye: Journal of Syriac Studies is an electronic journal dedicated to the study of the Syriac tradition, published semi-annually (in January and July) by Beth Mardutho: The Syriac Institute. Published since 1998, Hugoye seeks to offer the best scholarship available in the field of Syriac studies.

body.p: [1] St. Ephrem Eccumenical Research Institute, Kerala, will be organizing the Vth World Syriac Conference. The conference will be held at the Institute's headquarters in Kottayam, Kerala State, India, and is scheduled to take place between September 8, 2002, and September 14, 2002, pending a permission of the Government of India, New Delhi.

[2] We call upon scholars who are interested in attending to send us the following information: full name, title, affiliation, and a provisional title of a paper. Information can be sent directly to Dr. Jacob Thekeparampil, Director of SEERI. E-mail: seeri@sancharnet.in. Tel. no. 0091-481-564333.
